com.facebook.buck.cli

Class AdbHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.cli.AdbHelper

  • public class AdbHelper
extends Object
    Helper for executing commands over ADB, especially for multiple devices.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AdbHelper.AdbCallable
      Base class for commands to be run against an IDevice.
      static class  AdbHelper.CommandFailedException
      An exception that indicates that an executed command returned an unsuccessful exit code.

    • Method Detail

      • adbCall

        public boolean adbCall(AdbHelper.AdbCallable adbCallable)
                throws InterruptedException
        Execute an AdbHelper.AdbCallable for all matching devices. This functions performs device filtering based on three possible arguments: -e (emulator-only) - only emulators are passing the filter -d (device-only) - only real devices are passing the filter -s (serial) - only device/emulator with specific serial number are passing the filter If more than one device matches the filter this function will fail unless multi-install mode is enabled (-x). This flag is used as a marker that user understands that multiple devices will be used to install the apk if needed.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • executeCommandWithErrorChecking

        public static String executeCommandWithErrorChecking(com.android.ddmlib.IDevice device,
                                     String command)
                                              throws com.android.ddmlib.TimeoutException,
                                                     com.android.ddmlib.AdbCommandRejectedException,
                                                     com.android.ddmlib.ShellCommandUnresponsiveException,
                                                     IOException
        Runs a command on a device and throws an exception if it fails.

        This will not work if your command contains "exit" or "trap" statements.

        Parameters:
        device - Device to run the command on.
        command - Shell command to execute. Must not use "exit" or "trap".
        Returns:
        The full text output of the command.
        Throws:
        AdbHelper.CommandFailedException - if the command fails.
        com.android.ddmlib.TimeoutException
        com.android.ddmlib.AdbCommandRejectedException
        com.android.ddmlib.ShellCommandUnresponsiveException
        IOException

      • checkReceiverOutput

        public static String checkReceiverOutput(String command,
                         com.android.ddmlib.CollectingOutputReceiver receiver)
                                  throws AdbHelper.CommandFailedException
        This was made public for one specific call site in ExopackageInstaller. If you're reading this, you probably shouldn't call it. Pretend this method is private.
        Throws:
        AdbHelper.CommandFailedException

      • installApk

        public boolean installApk(InstallableApk installableApk,
                 InstallCommandOptions options)
                   throws InterruptedException
        Install apk on all matching devices. This functions performs device filtering based on three possible arguments: -e (emulator-only) - only emulators are passing the filter -d (device-only) - only real devices are passing the filter -s (serial) - only device/emulator with specific serial number are passing the filter If more than one device matches the filter this function will fail unless multi-install mode is enabled (-x). This flag is used as a marker that user understands that multiple devices will be used to install the apk if needed.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • installApkOnDevice

        public boolean installApkOnDevice(com.android.ddmlib.IDevice device,
                         File apk,
                         boolean installViaSd)
        Installs apk on specific device. Reports success or failure to console.
